tit.cmt: カッコ部分を修正しました。

sen.j: 皇嗣（こうし）とは、天子（皇帝や天皇）の跡継ぎのことである。
sen.e: Koshi (Imperial heir) is a successor of Tenshi (monarch or emperor).
The Koshi (imperial heir) is a successor of Tenshi (monarch or emperor).
sen.cmt: the を補いました。Imperial heir→imperial heir と修正しました。
sen.e: The Koshi (imperial heir) is a successor of Tenshi (monarch or emperor).

tit.e: The ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code)
The ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code)
The ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code)

sen.j: 律令制では皇位継承順位を明文化していなかった。
sen.e: The ritsuryo system did not provide a clear order of succession to the Imperial Throne.
The ritsuryo system did not provide a clear order of the succession to the Imperial Throne.
The ritsuryo system did not provide a clear order of the succession to the Imperial Throne.

sen.j: 例えば天皇の息子（皇太子）と弟（皇太弟）というように、皇位継承をめぐって権力闘争が起こった。
sen.e: There were many power struggles over succession to the Imperial Throne, for example an emperor's son (crown prince) and brother (the younger brother of an Emperor who is the heir apparent).
There were power struggles over succession to the Imperial Throne, such as an emperor's son (crown prince) and his younger brother (the younger brother of an emperor who is the heir apparent).
sen.cmt: many を削除しました。for example→such as,brother→his younger brother,スペースを修正しました。Emperor→emperor と修正ｈしました。
sen.e: There were power struggles over succession to the Imperial Throne, such as an emperor's son (crown prince) and his younger brother (the younger brother of an emperor who is the heir apparent).

tit.cmt: Act→Law と修正しました。ピリオドを削除しました。

sen.j: 皇室典範に皇嗣と皇嗣の呼び方について規定されている。
sen.e: The Imperial House Act provided for a clear order of succession
The Imperial House Law regulates about the imperial heir and its' appellation.
sen.cmt: Act→Law,文脈に応じて全体的に修正しました。ピリオドを補いました。
sen.e: The Imperial House Law regulates about the imperial heir and its' appellation.

sen.j: 皇嗣たる皇子を皇太子という。
sen.e: The prince who was the imperial heir would be called "Kotaishi" (crown prince).
The prince who is the imperial heir is called "Kotaishi" (crown prince).
sen.cmt: スペースを修正しました。was→is,would be→is と修正しました。
sen.e: The prince who is the imperial heir is called "Kotaishi" (crown prince).

sen.j: 皇太子のないときは、皇嗣たる皇孫を皇太孫という。
sen.e: If there was no Kotaishi, the imperial grandchild who was the imperial heir would be called "Kotaison" (son of the cron prince).
If there is no Kotaishi, the imperial grandchild who is the imperial heir is called "Kotaison" (son of the crown prince).
sen.cmt: was→is,would be→is,cron→crown と修正しました。
sen.e: If there is no Kotaishi, the imperial grandchild who is the imperial heir is called "Kotaison" (son of the crown prince).

sen.j: 皇長子（天皇の長男）や皇長孫（天皇の孫）、その他の皇長子の子孫のいずれもいない場合、皇位継承権の順位にもとづいて、皇次子（天皇の次男）及びその子孫が皇嗣となる。
sen.e: If Kochoshi (the first son of emperor), Kochoson (grandchild of emperor) or any other descendants of Kochoshi did not exist, "Kojishi" (the second son of emperor) and his descendants would be authorized as the imperial heirs.

If Kochoshi (the first son of the emperor), Kochoson (grandchild of the emperor) or any other descendants of Kochoshi do not exist, the "Kojishi" (the second son of the emperor) and his descendants will be authorized as the imperial heirs, based on the order of the right of succession to the Imperial Throne.
sen.cmt: the を補いました。did→do,would→will と修正しました。「皇位継承権の順位にもとづいて」の部分を補いました。
sen.e: If Kochoshi (the first son of the emperor), Kochoson (grandchild of the emperor) or any other descendants of Kochoshi do not exist, the "Kojishi" (the second son of the emperor) and his descendants will be authorized as the imperial heirs, based on the order of the right of succession to the Imperial Throne.

sen.j: この皇嗣を皇太弟という。
sen.e: This imperial heir would be called "kotaitei" (the younger brother of an Emperor who is the heir apparent).
This imperial heir would be called "kotaitei" (the younger brother of an emperor who is the heir apparent).
sen.cmt: would be→is,Emperor→emperor と修正しました。
sen.e: This imperial heir would be called "kotaitei" (the younger brother of an emperor who is the heir apparent).

sen.j: ただし、皇太弟という呼び方は皇室典範に規定されていない。
sen.e: However, the name of Kotaitei was not provided for in the Imperial House Act.
However, the appellation of Kotaitei is not specified on the Imperial House Law.
sen.cmt: name→appellation,was not provided for→is not specified,in→on,Act→Law と修正しました。
sen.e: However, the appellation of Kotaitei is not specified on the Imperial House Law.

sen.j: 天皇が崩御ときは、皇嗣が、直ちに即位する。
sen.e: When an emperor passed away, the imperial heir would ascend the throne immediately.
When an emperor passes away, the imperial heir will ascend to the throne immediately.
sen.cmt: passed→passes,would→will,ascend→ascend to と修正しました。
sen.e: When an emperor passes away, the imperial heir will ascend to the throne immediately.
